physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''#1030 Gordon Sign Co.'' On back of photograph: ''Interior Gordon Sign Co., #1030, small child - Leo Gordon, second from right - Harry Gordon.''

mods.abstract: Interior view of the Gordon Sign Company with men and boys at work. Third from the left is Leo Gordon and man seated second from the right is Harry Gordon. The others are unidentified. Harry Gordon migrated from Lithuania to New York before settling in Denver.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
